meanings.sent1: The marshmallow was the squashiest thing I've ever felt.
meanings.sent2: The ripe banana was the squashiest fruit in the basket.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally sat on the squashiest pillow, and it deflated like a balloon!
meanings.sent4: The squashiest bug I've ever seen got squashed under my shoe.
meanings.sent5: The squashiest sponge soaked up all the water in seconds.

meanings.sent1: Out of all the toys, the plush toy was the squashiest.
meanings.sent2: The cardboard box was the squashiest material to pack fragile items in.
meanings.sent3: The squashiest marshmallow in the bag got squished by the lid.
meanings.sent4: The squashiest snowball in the yard melted in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The squashiest loaf of bread flattened easily in my hand.
